Title: The Return
Plot: Everyone on Earth is excited about a comet passing by, but as soon as its trajectory changes to a collision course, everyone starts to panic. The comet turns out to be a giant ball of light that, after exploding, leaves behind 4400 people. They are missing persons who have been gone from a few months to 60 years, and none have aged a day. The 4400 are put in quarantine and eventually released. Some of the returnees begin to exhibit strange and uncontrollable new abilities. Tom Baldwin and Diana
GuestStars: Michael Moriarty,  Craig March,  Jason Low,  Terry Chen,  Jesse Hutch,  Ross Douglas,  Sheila Paterson,  Eric Breker,  Eileen Pedde,  Genevieve Buechner,  Adrian Holmes,  Roger Haskett,  Carrie Fleming,  Keith Ma
